contents.text: This document specifies an Internet standards track protocol for the Internet community, and requests discussion and suggestions for improvements. Please refer to the current edition of the "Internet Official Protocol Standards" (STD 1) for the standardization state and status of this protocol. Distribution of this memo is unlimited.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件规定了互联网社区的互联网标准跟踪协议，并要求进行讨论和提出改进建议。有关本协议的标准化状态和状态，请参考当前版本的“互联网官方协议标准”（STD 1）。本备忘录的分发不受限制。

contents.text: Abstract
contents.zh-CHS: 摘要

contents.text: This memo defines objects used for managing ATM-based interfaces, devices, and services, in addition to those defined in RFC 2515, the ATM-MIB, to provide additional support for the management of ATM Switched Virtual Connections (SVCs) and ATM Permanent Virtual Connections (PVCs).
contents.zh-CHS: 除了RFC 2515、ATM-MIB中定义的对象外，本备忘录还定义了用于管理基于ATM的接口、设备和服务的对象，以提供对ATM交换虚拟连接（SVC）和ATM永久虚拟连接（PVC）管理的额外支持。

1. The Internet-Standard Management Framework
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 因特网标准管理框架

contents.text: For a detailed overview of the documents that describe the current Internet-Standard Management Framework, please refer to section 7 of RFC 3410 [RFC3410].
contents.zh-CHS: 有关描述当前互联网标准管理框架的文件的详细概述，请参阅RFC 3410[RFC3410]第7节。

contents.text: Managed objects are accessed via a virtual information store, termed the Management Information Base or MIB. MIB objects are generally accessed through the Simple Network Management Protocol (SNMP). Objects in the MIB are defined using the mechanisms defined in the Structure of Management Information (SMI). This memo specifies a MIB module that is compliant to the SMIv2, which is described in STD 58, RFC 2578 [RFC2578], STD 58, RFC 2579 [RFC2579] and STD 58, RFC 2580 [RFC2580].
contents.zh-CHS: 托管对象通过虚拟信息存储（称为管理信息库或MIB）进行访问。MIB对象通常通过简单网络管理协议（SNMP）进行访问。MIB中的对象是使用管理信息结构（SMI）中定义的机制定义的。本备忘录规定了符合SMIv2的MIB模块，如STD 58、RFC 2578[RFC2578]、STD 58、RFC 2579[RFC2579]和STD 58、RFC 2580[RFC2580]所述。

contents.text: 2. Overview
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 概述

contents.text: The purpose of this memo is to provide additional capabilities, not found in the ATM-MIB [RFC2515], which are needed to manage ATM interfaces. This memo addresses the following areas:
contents.zh-CHS: 本备忘录旨在提供ATM-MIB[RFC2515]中未提供的管理ATM接口所需的附加功能。本备忘录涉及以下方面：

contents.text: - ATM Switch Support - ATM Service Support - ATM Host Support
contents.zh-CHS: - ATM交换机支持-ATM服务支持-ATM主机支持

contents.text: In addition, this memo also provides ATM trap support.
contents.zh-CHS: 此外，本备忘录还提供ATM陷阱支持。

contents.text: 2.1. Background
contents.zh-CHS: 2.1. 出身背景

contents.text: In addition to the MIB module defined in this memo, other MIB modules are necessary to manage ATM interfaces, links and cross-connects. Examples include MIB II for general system and interface management ([RFC2863]), the DS3 ([RFC2496]) or SONET MIBs ([RFC3592]) for management of SONET and DS3 physical interfaces, and, as appropriate, MIB modules for applications that make use of ATM, such as SMDS [RFC1694] and LAN Emulation [ATM Forum LANE]. These MIB modules are outside the scope of this specification.
contents.zh-CHS: 除了本备忘录中定义的MIB模块外，还需要其他MIB模块来管理ATM接口、链路和交叉连接。示例包括用于一般系统和接口管理的MIB II（[RFC2863]）、用于管理SONET和DS3物理接口的DS3（[RFC2496]）或SONET MIB（[RFC3592]），以及用于使用ATM的应用程序（如SMD[RFC1694]和LAN仿真[ATM Forum LANE]）的适当MIB模块。这些MIB模块不在本规范的范围内。

contents.text: This MIB module also requires the use of the ATM-MIB module defined in [RFC2515] and ATM-specific textual conventions defined in [RFC2514].
contents.zh-CHS: 该MIB模块还需要使用[RFC2515]中定义的ATM-MIB模块和[RFC2514]中定义的ATM特定文本约定。

contents.text: ATM Endpoint applications such as ATM LAN Emulation or Classical IP-over-ATM Clients and Servers use ATM to establish SVC/PVC connections for exchanging control and data information. The agents of these ATM applications must provide the network manager with information on the SVC/PVCs in use and which applications are using them. The information can be made generic so as to apply to all ATM
contents.zh-CHS: ATM端点应用程序（如ATM LAN仿真或传统的IP over ATM客户端和服务器）使用ATM建立SVC/PVC连接以交换控制和数据信息。这些ATM应用程序的代理必须向网络管理器提供有关正在使用的SVC/PVC以及正在使用它们的应用程序的信息。这些信息可以是通用的，以便适用于所有ATM

contents.text: applications. This memo defines extensions to the ATM-MIB [RFC2515] in order to support this.
contents.zh-CHS: 应用。本备忘录定义了ATM-MIB[RFC2515]的扩展，以支持此功能。

contents.text: The current specification of this supplemental ATM2-MIB is based on SNMPv2 SMI.
contents.zh-CHS: 本补充ATM2-MIB的当前规范基于SNMPv2 SMI。

contents.text: 2.2. Important Definitions
contents.zh-CHS: 2.2. 重要定义

contents.text: The following terms are defined here and used throughout this MIB:
contents.zh-CHS: 以下术语在此定义，并在本MIB中使用：

contents.text: - Virtual Path Link (VPL) - Virtual Path Connection (VPC) - Virtual Path Segment (VP Segment) - Virtual Channel Link (VCL) - Virtual Channel Connection (VCC) - Virtual Channel Segment (VC Segment).
contents.zh-CHS: - 虚拟路径链路（VPL）-虚拟路径连接（VPC）-虚拟路径段（VP段）-虚拟通道链路（VCL）-虚拟通道连接（VCC）-虚拟通道段（VC段）。

contents.text: The figures on the next page show how these terms apply in typical ATM network topologies. Additional terms relevant to this MIB are defined and illustrated in the ATM Terminology section 3 of [RFC2515].
contents.zh-CHS: 下一页的图显示了这些术语如何应用于典型的ATM网络拓扑。[RFC2515]的ATM术语第3节定义并说明了与本MIB相关的其他术语。

contents.text:
|<-->|                    |<-->|
Virtual Path Link         Virtual Path Link

|<----------------------------------------->|
            Virtual Path Connection
           (between Host1 and Host2)

|<--------------->|
     Virtual Path Segment
(between SwitchA and SwitchC)
Figure 1: Examples of Virtual Path Links, Virtual Path Connection, and Virtual Path Segment

Virtual Channel Link      Virtual Channel Link

|<----------------------------------------->|

Figure 2: Examples of Virtual Channel Links, Virtual Channel Connection, and Virtual Channel Segment
contents.zh-CHS: 图2：虚拟通道链路、虚拟通道连接和虚拟通道段的示例

contents.zh-CHS: 3. MIB中使用的约定

contents.text: Table 1: MIB structure
contents.zh-CHS: 表1:MIB结构

contents.text: 3.1.1. ATM SVC VP Cross-Connect Table
contents.zh-CHS: 3.1.1. ATM SVC VP交叉连接表

contents.text: This table provides the SVC VP Cross-Connect (SVPC) information. The equivalent PVC VP Cross-Connect table is defined in [RFC2515]. This table also includes cross-connect information for Soft PVPs.
contents.zh-CHS: 此表提供了SVC VP交叉连接（SVPC）信息。[RFC2515]中定义了等效PVC VP交叉连接表。此表还包括软PVP的交叉连接信息。

contents.text: This table contains configuration and state information of all SVC VP point-to-point, point-to-multipoint, or multipoint-to-multipoint VP cross-connects.
contents.zh-CHS: 此表包含所有SVC VP点对点、点对多点或多点对多点VP交叉连接的配置和状态信息。

contents.text: This table has read-only access and can be used to monitor the cross-connects which connect the VPLs together in an ATM switch or network. The atmSvcVpCrossConnectIndex is used to associate the related SVC VPLs that are cross-connected together. The atmSvcVpCrossConnectRowStatus object has read-write access to allow for tear-down.
contents.zh-CHS: 此表具有只读访问权限，可用于监控在ATM交换机或网络中将VPL连接在一起的交叉连接。ATMSVCVPCrossConnectionIndex用于关联交叉连接在一起的相关SVC VPL。atmSvcVpCrossConnectRowStatus对象具有读写访问权限以允许拆卸。

contents.text: The ATM SVC VP Cross-Connect Table models each bi-directional Switched Virtual Circuit (SVC) VP cross-connect as a set of entries in the atmSvcVpCrossConnectTable. A point-to-point VPC cross-connect is modeled as one entry; a point-to-multipoint (N leafs) VPC cross-connect as N entries in this table; and a multipoint-to-multipoint (N parties) VPC cross-connect as N(N-1)/2 entries in this table. In the latter cases, all the N (or N(N-1)/2) entries are associated with a single VPC cross-connect by having the same value of atmSvcVpCrossConnectIndex.
contents.zh-CHS: ATM SVC VP交叉连接表将每个双向交换虚拟电路（SVC）VP交叉连接建模为ATMSVCVP交叉连接表中的一组条目。将点到点VPC交叉连接建模为一个入口；一个点对多点（N个LEFS）VPC交叉连接作为本表中的N个条目；以及多点对多点（N方）VPC交叉连接，如本表中的N（N-1）/2项所示。在后一种情况下，所有N（或N（N-1）/2）项通过具有相同的ATMSVCVPCrossConnectionIndex值与单个VPC交叉连接相关联。

contents.text:
_________________________________________
     |                                       |
 Low |         ATM Switch or Network         | High
 port|                                       | port
_____|>> from low to high VPC traffic flow >>|______
     |<< from high to low VPC traffic flow <<|
     |_______________________________________|
Figure 3: VPC Cross-Connect Model
contents.zh-CHS: 图3：VPC交叉连接模型

contents.text: The terms low and high are chosen to represent numerical ordering of the two interfaces associated with a VPC cross-connect. That is, the ATM interface with the lower value of ifIndex is termed 'low', while the other ATM interface associated with the VPC cross-connect is termed 'high'.
contents.zh-CHS: 选择术语“低”和“高”表示与VPC交叉连接相关的两个接口的数字顺序。也就是说，ifIndex值较低的ATM接口称为“低”，而与VPC交叉连接相关的其他ATM接口称为“高”。

contents.text: 3.1.2. ATM SVC VC Cross-Connect Table
contents.zh-CHS: 3.1.2. ATM SVC VC交叉连接表

contents.text: This table provides the SVC Cross-Connect (SVCC) information. The equivalent PVC VC Cross-Connect table is defined in [RFC2515]. This table also includes cross-connect information for Soft PVCs.
contents.zh-CHS: 此表提供了SVC交叉连接（SVCC）信息。[RFC2515]中定义了等效PVC-VC交叉连接表。此表还包括软PVC的交叉连接信息。

contents.text: This table is used to model a bi-directional point-to-point, point-to-multipoint or multipoint-to-multipoint SVC VC cross-connect.
contents.zh-CHS: 此表用于对双向点对点、点对多点或多点对多点SVC VC交叉连接进行建模。

contents.text: This table has read-only access and is used to monitor the cross-connects which connect the VCLs together in an ATM switch or network that belong to a VC connection. The atmSvcVcCrossConnectIndex is used to associate the related SVC VCLs that are cross-connected together. The atmSvcVcCrossConnectRowStatus object has read-write access to allow for tear-down.
contents.zh-CHS: 此表具有只读访问权限，用于监控在属于VC连接的ATM交换机或网络中将VCL连接在一起的交叉连接。ATMSVCCrossConnectionIndex用于关联交叉连接在一起的相关SVC VCL。ATMSVCCrossConnectRowStatus对象具有读写访问权限以允许拆卸。

contents.text: The ATM SVC VC Cross-Connect Table models each bi-directional Switched Virtual Circuit (SVC) VC cross-connect as a set of entries in the atmSvcVcCrossConnectTable. A point-to-point VC cross-connect is modeled as one entry; a point-to-multipoint (N leafs) VC cross-connect as N entries in this table; and a multipoint-to-multipoint (N parties) VPC cross-connect as N(N-1)/2 entries in this table. In the latter cases, all the N (or N(N-1)/2) entries are associated with a single VPC cross-connect by having the same value of atmSvcVcCrossConnectIndex.
contents.zh-CHS: ATM SVC VC交叉连接表将每个双向交换虚拟电路（SVC）VC交叉连接建模为ATMSVCCrossConnectTable中的一组条目。将点对点VC交叉连接建模为一个入口；一个点对多点（N个LEFS）VC交叉连接作为该表中的N个条目；以及多点对多点（N方）VPC交叉连接，如本表中的N（N-1）/2项所示。在后一种情况下，所有N（或N（N-1）/2）项通过具有相同的ATMSVCCrossConnectionIndex值与单个VPC交叉连接相关联。

contents.text:
______________________________________
     |                                      |
 Low |         ATM Switch or Network        | High
 port|                                      | port
_____|>> from low to high VC traffic flow >>|______
     |<< from high to low VC traffic flow <<|
     |______________________________________|
Figure 4: VC Cross-Connect Model
contents.zh-CHS: 图4:VC交叉连接模型

contents.text: The terms low and high are chosen to represent numerical ordering of the two interfaces associated with a VPC cross-connect. That is, the ATM interface with the lower value of ifIndex is termed 'low', while the other ATM interface associated with the VPC cross-connect is termed 'high'.
contents.zh-CHS: 选择术语“低”和“高”表示与VPC交叉连接相关的两个接口的数字顺序。也就是说，ifIndex值较低的ATM接口称为“低”，而与VPC交叉连接相关的其他ATM接口称为“高”。

contents.text: 3.1.3. ATM Interface Signalling Statistics Table
contents.zh-CHS: 3.1.3. ATM接口信令统计表

contents.text: This table provides statistical information of the signalling entity. A signalling entity can be deployed over an ATM interface as defined in the atmInterfaceConfTable [RFC2515], a logical ATM interface defined in section 5.1.10.1 in this document, or a proprietary virtual interface as described in the atmInterfaceExtTable. To monitor the signalling entity, a few counters are provided. They are defined as:
contents.zh-CHS: 此表提供了信令实体的统计信息。信令实体可以部署在atmInterfaceConfTable[RFC2515]中定义的ATM接口、本文件第5.1.10.1节中定义的逻辑ATM接口或atmInterfaceExtTable中描述的专有虚拟接口上。为了监视信令实体，提供了几个计数器。它们的定义如下：

contents.text: atmSigSSCOPConEvents atmSigSSCOPErrdPdus atmSigDetectSetupAttempts atmSigEmitSetupAttempts atmSigDetectUnavailRoutes
contents.zh-CHS: atmSigSSCOPConEvents atmSigSSCOPErrdPdus atmSigDetectSetupAttempts ATMSIGItemSetupAttempts ATMSIGDetectNavailRoutes

contents.text: atmSigEmitUnavailRoutes atmSigDetectUnavailResrcs atmSigEmitUnavailResrcs atmSigDetectCldPtyEvents atmSigEmitCldPtyEvents atmSigDetectMsgErrors atmSigEmitMsgErrors atmSigDetectClgPtyEvents atmSigEmitClgPtyEvents atmSigDetectTimerExpireds atmSigEmitTimerExpireds atmSigDetectRestarts atmSigEmitRestarts atmSigInEstabls atmSigOutEstabls
contents.zh-CHS: ATMSIGITUNAVILERES ATMSIGDTETECUTNAVAILRESRCS ATMSIGITUNAVILRESRCS ATMSIGDTECLTCDPTYEVENTS ATMSIGDTECTMSGERRORS ATMSIGITMTSGERRORS ATMSIGDTECLTGPTYEVENTS ATMSIGDTETETETETTIMEREXPIREDS ATMSIGMTILERS ATMSIGDTERSTARTS ATMSIGETERSTARTES ATMSIGENTABLS ATMSIGOTESTABLS

contents.text: 3.1.4. ATM Signalling Capability Support
contents.zh-CHS: 3.1.4. ATM信令能力支持

contents.text: A number of Information Elements may or may not be supported by ATM switches or ATM Services. Hence, for trouble isolation it is important to keep track which particular Information Elements are supported. The corresponding group of objects must be supported by switches or services supporting SVCs, and indicate whether the following Information Elements are enabled/disabled:
contents.zh-CHS: ATM交换机或ATM服务可能支持也可能不支持许多信息元素。因此，对于故障隔离，跟踪支持哪些特定信息元素是很重要的。支持SVC的交换机或服务必须支持相应的对象组，并指示是否启用/禁用以下信息元素：

contents.text: 1) Calling party number
contents.zh-CHS: 1) 主叫方号码

contents.text: 2) Calling party subaddress
contents.zh-CHS: 2) 主叫方子地址

contents.text: 3) Called party subaddress
contents.zh-CHS: 3) 被叫方子地址

contents.text: 4) Broadband high layer information
contents.zh-CHS: 4) 宽带高层信息

contents.text: 5) Broadband low layer information
contents.zh-CHS: 5) 宽带低层信息

contents.text: 6) Broadband Repeat Indicator
contents.zh-CHS: 6) 宽带重复指示符

contents.text: 7) AAL parameters
contents.zh-CHS: 7) AAL参数

contents.text: The last parameter, Preferred Carrier Pre-Subscription, identifies the carrier to which intercarrier calls originated from this interface are routed when transit network selection information is not provided by the calling party.
contents.zh-CHS: 最后一个参数“Preferred Carrier Pre Subscription”（首选运营商预预订）标识了当主叫方未提供公交网络选择信息时，从该接口发起的载波间呼叫路由到的运营商。

contents.text: 3.1.5. Signalling Descriptor Parameter Table
contents.zh-CHS: 3.1.5. 信令描述符参数表

contents.text: This table extends the ATM VCL table of the ATM-MIB [RFC2515] to include all other necessary signalling information as specified in the ATM Forum UNI Specifications [ATM Forum 3.0] and [ATM Forum UNI 3.1]. A user can create an entry with all signalling parameters and later use that entry to specify the signalling characteristics of SVCs.
contents.zh-CHS: 此表扩展了ATM-MIB[RFC2515]的ATM VCL表，以包括ATM论坛UNI规范[ATM论坛3.0]和[ATM论坛UNI 3.1]中规定的所有其他必要信令信息。用户可以创建包含所有信令参数的条目，然后使用该条目指定SVC的信令特性。

contents.text: Some of the signalling parameters, such as the AAL5 parameters information element, are reflected in the VCL and VPL tables, and this table only contains the remaining AAL5 parameters.
contents.zh-CHS: 一些信令参数（如AAL5参数信息元素）反映在VCL和VPL表中，该表仅包含剩余的AAL5参数。

contents.text: Signalling attributes can be grouped into following categories:
contents.zh-CHS: 信令属性可分为以下类别：

contents.text: 1) ATM Adaptation Layer Parameters
contents.zh-CHS: 1) ATM适配层参数

contents.text: Information in this group is captured in the ATM Signalling Descriptor Parameter Table defined in this memo. Please refer to section 5.4.5.5 of [ATM Forum 3.0] and [ATM Forum UNI 3.1].
contents.zh-CHS: 此组中的信息在本备忘录中定义的ATM信令描述符参数表中捕获。请参考[ATM论坛3.0]和[ATM论坛UNI 3.1]的第5.4.5.5节。

contents.text: 2) Broadband High Layer Information
contents.zh-CHS: 2) 宽带高层信息

contents.text: Information in this group is captured by the ATM Signalling Descriptor Parameter Table defined in this memo. Please refer to section 5.4.5.8 of [ATM Forum 3.0] and [ATM Forum UNI 3.1].
contents.zh-CHS: 此组中的信息由本备忘录中定义的ATM信令描述符参数表捕获。请参考[ATM论坛3.0]和[ATM论坛UNI 3.1]的第5.4.5.8节。

contents.text: 3) Broadband Low Layer Information
contents.zh-CHS: 3) 宽带低层信息

contents.text: Information in this group is captured by the ATM Signalling Descriptor Parameter Table defined in this memo. Please refer to section 5.4.5.9 of [ATM Forum 3.0] and [ATM Forum UNI 3.1].
contents.zh-CHS: 此组中的信息由本备忘录中定义的ATM信令描述符参数表捕获。请参考[ATM论坛3.0]和[ATM论坛UNI 3.1]的第5.4.5.9节。

contents.text: 3.1.6. ATM Interface Registered Address Table
contents.zh-CHS: 3.1.6. ATM接口注册地址表

contents.text: This table contains a list of ATM addresses that can be used for calls to and from a given interface by a switch or service. The ATM addresses are either registered by the endsystem via ILMI or statically configured. This table does not expose PNNI reachability information. This table only applies to switches and network services. See also Section 5.2.
contents.zh-CHS: 此表包含ATM地址列表，可用于交换机或服务对给定接口的调用。ATM地址由终端系统通过ILMI注册或静态配置。此表不公开PNNI可达性信息。此表仅适用于交换机和网络服务。另见第5.2节。

contents.text: 3.1.7. ATM VPI/VCI to Address Mapping Table
contents.zh-CHS: 3.1.7. ATM VPI/VCI到地址映射表

contents.text: In the atmVclAddrTable, the object atmVclAddrAddr can either be an ATM Local Address or an ATM Remote Address which represent the two endpoint addresses of a VCL. ATM Local Address identifies the local endpoint of the VCL represented by this agent. The ATM Remote address represents the address of the ATM application at the other end of the VCL.
contents.zh-CHS: 在ATMVCLADDRABLE中，对象ATMVCLADDRR可以是ATM本地地址，也可以是代表VCL的两个端点地址的ATM远程地址。ATM本地地址标识此代理表示的VCL的本地端点。ATM远程地址表示VCL另一端的ATM应用程序的地址。

contents.text: 3.1.8. ATM Address to VPI/VCI Mapping Table
contents.zh-CHS: 3.1.8. ATM地址到VPI/VCI映射表

contents.text: This table provides an alternative way to retrieve the atmVclTable. This table can be used to retrieve the indexing to the atmVclTable by an ATM address.
contents.zh-CHS: 此表提供了检索atmVclTable的另一种方法。此表可用于通过ATM地址检索到atmVclTable的索引。

contents.text: 3.1.9. ATM VPL Statistics Table
contents.zh-CHS: 3.1.9. ATM VPL统计表

contents.text: The atmVplStatTable includes per-VPL cell counters. The VPL cell counters count the valid ATM cells. The valid ATM cells include the user and OAM cells but exclude the physical layer (e.g., idle cells) and unassigned cells. Cells coming into an ATM managed system are counted differently with the high Cell Loss Priority (CLP=0) or low Cell Loss Priority (CLP=1). The cells are tagged, passed or discarded depending on the incoming CLP value and the policed cell rate by the "traffic policing" entity in the ATM managed system. Refer to [ATM Forum 3.0] and [ATM Forum UNI 3.1] for a description of the traffic policing.
contents.zh-CHS: atmVplStatTable包括每个VPL单元计数器。VPL信元计数器对有效的ATM信元进行计数。有效的ATM信元包括用户信元和OAM信元，但不包括物理层（例如空闲信元）和未分配信元。进入ATM管理系统的信元计数不同，信元丢失优先级高（CLP=0）或信元丢失优先级低（CLP=1）。ATM管理系统中的“交通管制”实体根据传入CLP值和管制的信元速率对信元进行标记、传递或丢弃。有关交通管制的说明，请参阅[ATM论坛3.0]和[ATM论坛UNI 3.1]。

contents.text:
In the switch where the traffic policing is not supported, cells are
passed or discarded depending on the bandwidth and buffering capacity
of the switching fabric.  The Output Tagged Cells counter, in this
case, is always zero.
              _______________
              | ATM Managed |
   Input      | System      | Output
   CLP=0 cells|             | CLP=0 cells
   ---------->|             |----------->
   CLP=1 cells| (traffic    | CLP=1 cells
   ---------->| policing    |----------->
              | entity)     | Tagged cells (CLP=1)
              |_____________|----------->
               |Discard  | Discard
               |CLP=0    | CLP=1
               |cells    | cells
               |         |
               V         V
Figure 5: ATM Cell Counters per VPL
contents.zh-CHS: 图5：每个VPL的ATM信元计数器

contents.text: In this table, cells coming into and out of the managed ATM system are counted as the total number of cells and the cells with the CLP=0. The CLP=1 counter is derived by subtracting CLP=0 cells from the total cells. In addition, cells that are tagged on the output are also counted. The output CLP=1 cells equals the total cells out count minus both the CLP=0 cells and the tagged cells.
contents.zh-CHS: 在此表中，进出受管ATM系统的信元被计算为信元总数和CLP=0的信元数。CLP=1计数器是通过从总单元格中减去CLP=0单元格得出的。此外，输出上标记的单元格也会被计数。输出CLP=1单元等于总单元输出计数减去CLP=0单元和标记单元。

contents.text: 3.1.10. ATM VPL Logical Port Table
contents.zh-CHS: 3.1.10. ATM VPL逻辑端口表

contents.text: The ATM VPL Logical Port Table includes all ATM logical port interface configuration information.
contents.zh-CHS: ATM VPL逻辑端口表包括所有ATM逻辑端口接口配置信息。

contents.text: 3.1.10.1. ATM Logical Port Interface
contents.zh-CHS: 3.1.10.1. ATM逻辑端口接口

contents.text: The interface type "ATM Logical Port" (ifType=80) is defined to allow the representation of a VP Tunnel, which is a VPL used as a trunk connection (most likely between devices that are not physically adjacent), providing for multiplexing and demultiplexing of VCs on the VP. Figure 6 illustrates such a VP Tunnel.
contents.zh-CHS: 接口类型“ATM逻辑端口”（ifType=80）定义为允许表示VP隧道，VP隧道是用作中继连接的VPL（最有可能在物理上不相邻的设备之间），提供VP上VCs的多路复用和解多路复用。图6显示了这样一个VP隧道。

contents.text: Note: the "ATM Logical Port" interface is more of a logical port, compared with an interface of type "ATM" which is more of a physical port that provides for the transport of many VP and VC connections between adjacent devices.
contents.zh-CHS: 注：“ATM逻辑端口”接口更多地是一个逻辑端口，而“ATM”类型的接口更多地是一个物理端口，用于在相邻设备之间传输多个VP和VC连接。

contents.text: Figure 6: Virtual Path Tunnel
contents.zh-CHS: 图6：虚拟路径隧道

contents.text: In Figure 6, a VP tunnel (denoted as VPL1 by Switch A, and as VPL2 by Switch B) is used to connect VCL1 with VCL4 and VCL2 with VCL3. Figure 6 shows only one VP tunnel, but there can be multiple VP tunnels over the same physical interface.
contents.zh-CHS: 在图6中，VP隧道（交换机a表示为VPL1，交换机B表示为VPL2）用于连接VCL1与VCL4，VCL2与VCL3。图6仅显示了一个VP隧道，但在同一物理接口上可以有多个VP隧道。

contents.text: A particularly useful VP tunnel scenario is tunneling across a public network that does not support signalling. In Figure 6 above, assume Switches A and B are private switches that signal over the VP to set up connections transparently through the public network. The public network would just transport a PVC VP between the two switches.
contents.zh-CHS: 一个特别有用的VP隧道场景是在不支持信令的公共网络上进行隧道传输。在上面的图6中，假设交换机A和B是专用交换机，它们通过VP发出信号，通过公共网络透明地建立连接。公共网络将只在两个交换机之间传输一个PVC VP。

contents.text: Because the VP Tunnel constitutes an interface between two ATM devices that are not necessarily physically adjacent, most of the management information pertaining to the interface may differ for the tunnel, including:
contents.zh-CHS: 由于VP隧道构成两个不一定物理相邻的ATM设备之间的接口，因此与该接口有关的大多数管理信息可能因隧道而异，包括：

contents.text: - active VPI/VCI fields (the tunnel may be a subset of the parent interface). - maximum number of VCCs - configured VCCs - ILMI VPI/VCI values - ATM address type - ATM administrative address - received/transmitted cells.
contents.zh-CHS: - 活动VPI/VCI字段（隧道可能是父接口的子集）。-VCC的最大数量-配置VCC-ILMI VPI/VCI值-ATM地址类型-ATM管理地址-接收/发送的信元。

contents.text: 3.1.10.2. How to create an ATM Logical Port interface
contents.zh-CHS: 3.1.10.2. 如何创建ATM逻辑端口接口

contents.text: On ATM devices supporting VP tunnels, the ATM Logical Port Interface Table can be used to create VP tunnels. To create an ATM Logical Port interface via SNMP:
contents.zh-CHS: 在支持VP隧道的ATM设备上，可以使用ATM逻辑端口接口表创建VP隧道。要通过SNMP创建ATM逻辑端口接口：

contents.text: - Create a VPL (e.g., VPI=a on an existing ATM interface which has ifIndex=x) in the atmVplTable.
contents.zh-CHS: - 在atmVplTable中创建VPL（例如，在ifIndex=x的现有ATM接口上创建VPI=a）。

contents.text: - Set the object atmVplLogicalPortDef to isLogicalIf. A new row in the ifTable is then created by the agent, with ifIndex=y, to represent the ATM Logical Port interface. The object atmVplLogicalPortIndex is also set to y by the agent to represent the ifIndex value of the ATM Logical Port interface.
contents.zh-CHS: - 将对象atmVplLogicalPortDef设置为isLogicalIf。然后，代理在ifTable中创建一个新行，ifIndex=y，以表示ATM逻辑端口接口。代理程序还将对象atmVplLogicalPortIndex设置为y，以表示ATM逻辑端口接口的ifIndex值。

contents.text: - The ifEntry values are set for the ATM Logical Port interface (ifIndex=y) as discussed in RFC 2515, with the following exceptions: * ifType - a new enumerated value of atmLogical(80) was added to IANAifType, specifying an "ATM Logical Port" interface. * ifSpeed - The total bandwidth in bits per second for use by the ATM layer. Computed from the traffic descriptor for the VPL.
contents.zh-CHS: - 如RFC 2515中所述，为ATM逻辑端口接口（ifIndex=y）设置ifEntry值，但以下情况除外：*ifType-在IANAifType中添加了一个新的ATMLLogical（80）枚举值，指定了一个“ATM逻辑端口”接口。*ifSpeed—ATM层使用的总带宽（以比特/秒为单位）。根据VPL的流量描述符计算。

contents.text: * ifOperStatus - determined hierarchically, depending on the state of the physical atm-cell layer interface beneath it, and the ILMI on the VP. * ifInOctets, ifOutOctets - support of these objects is not mandatory for ATM Logical Port interfaces. * ifInErrors - always zero, HEC errors are specified for the atm cell-layer interface beneath it. * ifInUnknownProtos - always zero, errors are specified for the atm cell-layer interface beneath it.
contents.zh-CHS: *ifOperStatus—根据其下的物理atm信元层接口的状态和VP上的ILMI分层确定。*ifInOctets、IFOUTPoctets-ATM逻辑端口接口不强制支持这些对象。*ifInErrors-始终为零，为其下的atm信元层接口指定HEC错误。*如果UnknownProtos-始终为零，则为其下的atm信元层接口指定错误。

contents.text: - The atmInterfaceConfEntry values are set and reported as discussed in [RFC2515], with the following exceptions: * atmInterfaceMaxVpcs - 0. * atmInterfaceConfVpcs - 0. * atmInterfaceIlmiVpi - VPI of the VP tunnel.
contents.zh-CHS: - AtminterFaceConentry值的设置和报告如[RFC2515]中所述，但有以下例外：*atmInterfaceMaxVpcs-0.*atmInterfaceConfVpcs-0.*atmInterfaceIlmiVpi-VP隧道的VPI。

contents.text: - The atmInterfaceExtEntry values are set and reported as follows: * atmInterfaceConfMaxSvpcVpi - VPI of the VP tunnel, although VPCs cannot be setup on a VP tunnel. * atmInterfaceCurrentMaxSvpcVpi - VPI of VP tunnel, although VPCs cannot be setup on a VP tunnel. * atmInterfaceConfMaxSvccVpi - VPI of the VP tunnel. * atmInterfaceCurrentMaxSvccVpi - VPI of VP tunnel. * atmIntfPvcFailures - Includes failures of PVCLs within the VP tunnel, but not of the PVPL itself, since those are reported on the atm(37) interface. * atmIntfCurrentlyFailingPVpls - 0. * atmIntfPvcFailuresTrapEnable - Enables traps for PVCL failures within the VP tunnel, but not for the PVPL itself, since the latter are generated on behalf of the atm(37) interface.
contents.zh-CHS: - atmInterfaceExtEntry值的设置和报告如下：*atmInterfaceConfMaxSvpcVpi-VP隧道的VPI，但VPC无法在VP隧道上设置。*atmInterfaceCurrentMaxSvpcVpi-VP隧道的VPI，但无法在VP隧道上设置VPC。*atmInterfaceConfMaxSvccVpi-VP隧道的VPI。*atmInterfaceCurrentMaxSvccVpi-VP隧道的VPI。*atmIntfPvcFailures-包括VP隧道内的PVCL故障，但不包括PVPL本身的故障，因为这些故障在atm（37）接口上报告。*atmIntfCurrentlyFailingPVpls-0.*atmIntfPvcFailuresTrapEnable-为VP隧道内的PVCL故障启用陷阱，但不为PVPL本身启用陷阱，因为后者是代表atm（37）接口生成的。

contents.text: - An entry is created in the ifStackTable, with values: ifStackHigherLayer=y, ifStackLowerLayer=x.
contents.zh-CHS: - 在ifStackTable中创建一个条目，其值为：ifStackHigherLayer=y，ifStackLowerLayer=x。

contents.text: - VCLs defined on the VP tunnel are indexed by ifIndex=y, VPI=a, VCI.
contents.zh-CHS: - VP通道上定义的VCL由ifIndex=y、VPI=a、VCI索引。

contents.text: 3.1.11. ATM VCL Statistics Table
contents.zh-CHS: 3.1.11. ATM VCL统计表

contents.text: The atmVclStatTable includes per-VCL cell counters. The VCL cell counters count the valid ATM cells. The valid ATM cells include the user and OAM cells but exclude the physical layer (e.g., idle cells) and unassigned cells. Cells coming into an ATM managed system are counted differently with the high Cell Loss Priority (CLP=0) or low Cell Loss Priority (CLP=1). The cells are tagged, passed or discarded depending on the incoming CLP value and the policed cell rate by the "traffic policing" entity in the ATM managed system. Refer to [ATM Forum 3.0] and [ATM Forum UNI 3.1] for the description of the traffic policing.
contents.zh-CHS: atmVclStatTable包括每个VCL单元计数器。VCL信元计数器对有效的ATM信元进行计数。有效的ATM信元包括用户信元和OAM信元，但不包括物理层（例如空闲信元）和未分配信元。进入ATM管理系统的信元计数不同，信元丢失优先级高（CLP=0）或信元丢失优先级低（CLP=1）。ATM管理系统中的“交通管制”实体根据传入CLP值和管制的信元速率对信元进行标记、传递或丢弃。有关交通管制的说明，请参阅[ATM论坛3.0]和[ATM论坛UNI 3.1]。

contents.text: In a switch where the traffic policing is not supported, cells are passed or discarded depending on the bandwidth and buffering capacity of the switching fabric. The Output Tagged Cells counter, in this case, is always zero.
contents.zh-CHS: 在不支持流量管理的交换机中，根据交换结构的带宽和缓冲容量传递或丢弃小区。在这种情况下，输出标记的单元格计数器始终为零。

contents.text:
_______________
           | ATM Managed |
Input      | System      | Output
CLP=0 cells|             | CLP=0 cells
---------->|             |----------->
CLP=1 cells| (traffic    | CLP=1 cells
---------->| policing    |----------->
           | entity)     | Tagged cells (CLP=1)
           |_____________|----------->
            |Discard  | Discard
            |CLP=0    | CLP=1
            |cells    | cells
            |         |
            V         V
Figure 7: ATM Cell Counters per VCL
contents.zh-CHS: 图7：每个VCL的ATM信元计数器

contents.text: In this table, cells coming into and out of the managed ATM system are counted as the total number of cells and the cells with the CLP=0. The CLP=1 counter is derived by subtracting CLP=0 cells from the total cells. In addition, cells that are tagged on the output are also counted. The output CLP=1 cells equals the total cells out count minus both the CLP=0 cells and the tagged cells.
contents.zh-CHS: 在此表中，进出受管ATM系统的信元被计算为信元总数和CLP=0的信元数。CLP=1计数器是通过从总单元格中减去CLP=0单元格得出的。此外，输出上标记的单元格也会被计数。输出CLP=1单元等于总单元输出计数减去CLP=0单元和标记单元。

contents.text: 3.1.12. ATM VC General Information Table
contents.zh-CHS: 3.1.12. ATM VC通用信息表

contents.text: This table contains the general information for each VC. It provides an index to the atmSigDescrParamTable defined in this MIB. This table is an extension to the atmVclTable defined in the ATM-MIB [RFC2515].
contents.zh-CHS: 此表包含每个VC的一般信息。它提供此MIB中定义的ATMSIGDESCRPARAMETABLE的索引。该表是ATM-MIB[RFC2515]中定义的atmVclTable的扩展。

contents.text: 3.1.13. ATM Interface Configuration Extension Table
contents.zh-CHS: 3.1.13. ATM接口配置扩展表

contents.text: The ATM Interface Configuration Extension Table contains ATM interface information that supplements the atmInterfaceConfTable defined in [RFC2515]. It includes the configuration information of the interface type (i.e., connection setup procedures) and ILMI.
contents.zh-CHS: ATM接口配置扩展表包含补充[RFC2515]中定义的atmInterfaceConfTable的ATM接口信息。它包括接口类型（即连接设置过程）和ILMI的配置信息。

contents.text: A network manager can configure the interface to run a specific type of connection setup procedures (i.e., protocol and version) such as ITU-T DSS2, ATM Forum UNI 3.1, PNNI 1.0 or BICI 2.0. It can also dictate the role of the managed entity as one side of the interface. For example, if an interface is configured to run ATM Forum UNI 3.1, the managed entity has to be told to run as either the network side or the user side of the UNI.
contents.zh-CHS: 网络管理器可以配置接口以运行特定类型的连接设置程序（即协议和版本），如ITU-T DSS2、ATM Forum UNI 3.1、PNNI 1.0或BICI 2.0。它还可以将托管实体的角色指定为接口的一方。例如，如果接口配置为运行ATM论坛UNI 3.1，则必须告知受管实体作为UNI的网络侧或用户侧运行。

contents.text: The objects atmIntfConfigType and atmIntfConfigSide are used for configuration and the objects atmIntfActualType and atmIntfActualSide are used for reading back the actual interface protocol and version.
contents.zh-CHS: 对象atmIntfConfigType和atmIntfConfigSide用于配置，对象atmIntfActualType和atmIntfActualSide用于读回实际的接口协议和版本。

contents.text: The following table describes all the valid combinations of configuration of the interface type and side. Note that the value N/A meaning not applicable, should be set to the value other(1) when used.
contents.zh-CHS: 下表描述了接口类型和端的所有有效配置组合。请注意，值N/A表示不适用，使用时应设置为值other（1）。

contents.text:
atmIntfConfigType          atmIntfConfigSide
-----------------          -----------------
autoConfig                 N/A
ituDss2                    user/network
atmfUni3Dot0               user/network
atmfUni3Dot1               user/network
atmfUni4Dot0               user/network
atmfIispUni3Dot0           user/network
atmfIispUni3Dot1           user/network
atmfIispUni4Dot0           user/network
atmfPnni1Dot0              N/A
atmfBici2Dot0              N/A
atmfUniPvcOnly             user/network
atmfNniPvcOnly             N/A

When the value of the object atmIntfConfigType is configured to autoConfig(2), the interface type is determined via the ATM Forum ILMI auto-configuration procedures [ATM Forum ILMI]. There is no need to set the interface side since it should be a derived value. The PNNI and BICI interfaces are always symmetric so setting the interface side is also not necessary.
contents.zh-CHS: 当对象atmIntfConfigType的值配置为自动配置（2）时，接口类型通过ATM论坛ILMI自动配置程序[ATM论坛ILMI]确定。不需要设置接口端，因为它应该是派生值。PNNI和BICI接口始终是对称的，因此无需设置接口侧。

contents.text: This table also includes the configured and negotiated maximum VPI value per ATM interface, and the configured and negotiated minimum VCI value per ATM interface. Refer to [ATM Forum ILMI] Sections 8.2.3.8 through 8.2.3.10 for a detailed description.
contents.zh-CHS: 该表还包括每个ATM接口配置和协商的最大VPI值，以及每个ATM接口配置和协商的最小VCI值。有关详细说明，请参阅[ATM论坛ILMI]第8.2.3.8节至第8.2.3.10节。

contents.text: The following figure provides an example how the current minimum VCI values are derived from the configured minimum VCI values and the neighboring minimum VCI values:
contents.zh-CHS: 下图提供了如何从配置的最小VCI值和相邻的最小VCI值导出当前最小VCI值的示例：

contents.text: ifA: Configured Min SVCC VCI = 32 (configured) Current Min SVCC VCI = 40 (negotiated)
contents.zh-CHS: ifA：配置的最小SVCC VCI=32（配置）当前最小SVCC VCI=40（协商）

contents.text: ifB: Configured Min SVCC VCI = 40 (configured) Current Min SVCC VCI = 40 (negotiated)
contents.zh-CHS: ifB：配置的最小SVCC VCI=40（配置）当前最小SVCC VCI=40（协商）

contents.text: ifC: Configured Min SVCC VCI = 32 (configured) Current Min SVCC VCI = 32 (negotiated)
contents.zh-CHS: ifC：配置的最小SVCC VCI=32（配置）当前最小SVCC VCI=32（协商）

contents.text: ifD: Configured Min SVCC VCI = 32 (configured) Current Min SVCC VCI = 32 (negotiated)
contents.zh-CHS: ifD：配置的最小SVCC VCI=32（配置）当前最小SVCC VCI=32（协商）

contents.text: Between ifA and ifB, the maximum of the two vales for atmInterfaceConfMinSvccVci is 40, so both interfaces set their atmInterfaceCurrentMinSvccVci values to 40. On the other hand, since ifC and ifD both are configured with atmInterfaceConfMinSvccVci values of 32, they set their atmInterfaceCurrentMinSvccVci values to 32.
contents.zh-CHS: 在ifA和ifB之间，atmInterfaceConfMinSvccVci的两个值的最大值为40，因此两个接口都将其atmInterfaceCurrentMinSvccVci值设置为40。另一方面，由于ifC和ifD都配置了32的AtminterFaceConfMinsvccci值，因此它们将其AtminterFaceCurrentMinsvccci值设置为32。

contents.text: Figure 8: Examples of configured vs. negotiated ILMI values
contents.zh-CHS: 图8：配置与协商ILMI值的示例

contents.text: 3.1.14. ATM ILMI Service Registry Table
contents.zh-CHS: 3.1.14. ATM ILMI服务注册表表

contents.text: This table contains information used by the switch/service to inform ATM hosts of the location of ATM network services such as the LAN Emulation Configuration Server (LECS), the ATM Name Server (ANS), the ATMARP Server, the Multicast Address Resolution Server (MARS), and the NHRP Server (NHS). Entries in this table are exported to adjacent devices via ILMI over either all or a few user selected ATM interfaces.
contents.zh-CHS: 此表包含交换机/服务用于通知ATM主机ATM网络服务的位置的信息，如LAN仿真配置服务器（LECS）、ATM名称服务器（ANS）、ATMARP服务器、多播地址解析服务器（MARS）和NHRP服务器（NHS）。此表中的条目通过ILMI通过所有或少数用户选择的ATM接口导出到相邻设备。

contents.text: As an example, let's assume that:
contents.zh-CHS: 例如，让我们假设：

contents.text: - An ATM switch X has three interfaces if1, if2 and if3. - There are two ATM network services offered, a1.a2...aN and b1.b2...bN, where a1.a2...aN is an object identifier used to identify the first service, and b1.b2...bN is the object identifier for the other service. - The first service is available at the ATM address 'a'. - The second service is available at the ATM address 'b'. - The first service can be used by any device connecting to the switch X. - The second service can be used only by devices that connect to interfaces if1 and if3 on switch X.
contents.zh-CHS: - ATM交换机X有三个接口if1、if2和if3。-提供两种ATM网络服务，a1.a2…aN和b1.b2…bN，其中a1.a2…aN是用于标识第一个服务的对象标识符，b1.b2…bN是另一个服务的对象标识符。-第一项服务在ATM地址“a”可用第二项服务在ATM地址“b”处可用第一个服务可由连接到交换机X的任何设备使用。第二个服务仅可由连接到交换机X上接口if1和if3的设备使用。

contents.text: Figure 9: ATM topology with registered services
contents.zh-CHS: 图9：注册服务的ATM拓扑

contents.text: The table for switch X will contain three entries:
contents.zh-CHS: 开关X的表格将包含三个条目：

contents.text: - one entry for the "a1.a2...aN", implicitly available to any devices on switch X. - two entries for the "b1.b2...bN" (one for each interface where this service can be explicitly used).
contents.zh-CHS: - “a1.a2…aN”的一个条目可隐式用于交换机X上的任何设备。“b1.b2…bN”的两个条目（可显式使用此服务的每个接口一个条目）。

contents.text: The content of the table is:
contents.zh-CHS: 表格内容如下：

contents.text: - Service Identifier: a1.a2...aN b1.b2...bN b1.b2...bN - ATM address: a b b - Arbitrary index: m n p - Available interface: 0 1 3
contents.zh-CHS: - 服务标识符：a1.a2…aN b1.b2…bN b1.b2…bN-ATM地址：a b b-任意索引：m n p-可用接口：0 1 3

contents.text: where the Service Identifier values a1.a2...aN and b1.b2...bN are represented by atmIlmiSrvcRegServiceID, the ATM addresses a and b are represented by atmIlmiSrvcRegATMAddress, the values m, n, and p are arbitrary non-zero integer parameters (necessary in this example to differentiate the two entries for b1.b2...bN that are both available at the ATM address 'b') represented by atmIlmiSrvcRegAddressIndex, and the available interfaces are represented by atmIlmiSrvcRegIndex, where the special value 0 indicates any ATM interface.
contents.zh-CHS: 其中，服务标识符值a1.a2…aN和b1.b2…bN由atmIlmiSrvcRegServiceID表示，ATM地址a和b由ATMILMISRVCREGATMADRESS表示，值m、n和p为任意非零整数参数（本例中有必要区分b1.b2…bN的两个条目，这两个条目都在ATM地址“b”处可用），由ATMILMISRVCREGADRESINDEX表示，可用接口由atmIlmiSrvcRegIndex表示，其中特殊值0表示任何ATM接口。

contents.text: When querying the ILMI service registry table, through the ILMI protocol:
contents.zh-CHS: 通过ILMI协议查询ILMI服务注册表表时：

contents.text: - the device attached to interface if1 will obtain the address a and b.
contents.zh-CHS: - 连接到接口if1的设备将获得地址a和b。

contents.text: - the device attached to interface if2 will obtain the address a only.
contents.zh-CHS: - 连接到接口if2的设备将仅获取地址a。

contents.text: - the device attached to interface if3 will obtain the address a and b.
contents.zh-CHS: - 连接到接口if3的设备将获得地址a和b。

contents.text: 3.1.15. ILMI Network Prefix Table
contents.zh-CHS: 3.1.15. 网络前缀表

contents.text: A table specifying per-interface network prefix(es) supplied by the network side of the UNI during ILMI address registration. When no network prefixes are specified for a particular interface, one or more network prefixes based on the switch address(es) may be used for ILMI address registration.
contents.zh-CHS: 指定在ILMI地址注册期间由UNI的网络侧提供的每个接口网络前缀的表。当没有为特定接口指定网络前缀时，基于交换机地址的一个或多个网络前缀可用于ILMI地址注册。

contents.text: 3.1.16. ATM Switch Address Table
contents.zh-CHS: 3.1.16. ATM交换机地址表

contents.text: This table contains one or more ATM endsystem addresses on a per-switch basis. These addresses are used to identify the switch. When no ILMI network prefixes are configured for certain interfaces, network prefixes based on the switch address(es) may be used for ILMI address registration.
contents.zh-CHS: 此表包含每个交换机的一个或多个ATM终端系统地址。这些地址用于标识交换机。当没有为某些接口配置ILMI网络前缀时，基于交换机地址的网络前缀可用于ILMI地址注册。

contents.text: 3.1.17. AAL5 per-VCC Statistics Table
contents.zh-CHS: 3.1.17. 每VCC统计表AAL5

contents.text: This table contains the AAL5 statistics for the VCCs.
contents.zh-CHS: 此表包含VCC的AAL5统计数据。

contents.text: 3.1.18. ATM VP Cross-Connect Extension Table
contents.zh-CHS: 3.1.18. ATM VP交叉连接扩展表

contents.text: This table extends the atmVpCrossConnectTable defined in ATM-MIB [RFC2515].
contents.zh-CHS: 此表扩展了ATM-MIB[RFC2515]中定义的atmVpCrossConnectTable。

contents.text: 3.1.19. ATM VC Cross-Connect Extension Table
contents.zh-CHS: 3.1.19. ATM VC交叉连接扩展表

contents.text: This table extends the atmVcCrossConnectTable defined in ATM-MIB [RFC2515].
contents.zh-CHS: 此表扩展了ATM-MIB[RFC2515]中定义的atmVcCrossConnectTable。

contents.text: 3.1.20. Currently Failing PVPL Table
contents.zh-CHS: 3.1.20. 当前失败的PVPL表

contents.text: This table contains all the PVPLs that are in trouble.
contents.zh-CHS: 此表包含所有有问题的PVPL。

contents.text: 3.1.21. Currently Failing PVCL Table
contents.zh-CHS: 3.1.21. 当前失败的PVCL表

contents.text: This table contains all the PVCLs that are in trouble.
contents.zh-CHS: 此表包含有故障的所有PVCL。

contents.text: 3.1.22. Leaf Initiated Join Counter support
contents.zh-CHS: 3.1.22. 叶发起的连接计数器支持

contents.text: Two counter objects are added to count the number of leaf intiated setup requests and setup failures.
contents.zh-CHS: 添加两个计数器对象以计算叶初始化的安装请求数和安装失败数。

contents.text: 3.2. Network and User Addresses
contents.zh-CHS: 3.2. 网络和用户地址

contents.text: At the user side of a given ATM UNI interface there may be an address, "ifPhysAddress", to identify the interface. In addition, there may be several other addresses which can be used to originate and receive calls. These other addresses that are used to receive calls are listed in the "ifRcvAddrTable" defined in RFC 2863. The registered addresses on the network side are listed in the ATM Registered Address Table. The ATM Registered Address Table is supported by switches and network services. It is not supported by hosts.
contents.zh-CHS: 在给定ATM UNI接口的用户端，可能有一个地址“ifPhysAddress”，用于标识接口。此外，可能还有几个其他地址可用于发起和接收呼叫。RFC 2863中定义的“ifRcvAddrTable”中列出了用于接收呼叫的这些其他地址。网络侧的注册地址列在ATM注册地址表中。ATM注册地址表由交换机和网络服务支持。主机不支持它。

contents.text: 3.3. Configuration of VPLs, VCLs, and Cross-Connects
contents.zh-CHS: 3.3. VPL、VCL和交叉连接的配置

contents.text: The ATM Managed Objects needed to support the configuration of VPLs, VCLs, and Cross-Connects of the Permanent VPLs and VCLs are defined in the ATM-MIB [RFC2515]. Cross-Connects of the Switched VPLs and VCLs are defined in this memo.
contents.zh-CHS: ATM-MIB[RFC2515]中定义了支持VPL、VCL配置以及永久VPL和VCL交叉连接所需的ATM管理对象。本备忘录中定义了交换VPL和VCL的交叉连接。

contents.text: 3.4. ATM-related Trap Support
contents.zh-CHS: 3.4. ATM相关陷阱支持

contents.text: Traps are defined to detect changes in the status of permanent VPLs and VCLs. The current up/down status of each permanent VPL or VCL is indicated by the atmVplOperStatus or atmVclOperStatus object, respectively. Several tables and objects and one trap are defined in
contents.zh-CHS: 陷阱用于检测永久性VPL和VCL状态的变化。每个永久性VPL或VCL的当前向上/向下状态分别由atmVplOperStatus或atmVclOperStatus对象指示。中定义了多个表和对象以及一个陷阱

contents.text: order to help network managers quickly and efficiently detect changes in the status of permanent virtual links. Through use of these tables, objects, and traps, the time consuming and resource intensive task of continuously polling each row in the entire atmVplTable and atmVclTable can be avoided.
contents.zh-CHS: 以帮助网络管理员快速有效地检测永久虚拟链路状态的变化。通过使用这些表、对象和陷阱，可以避免在整个atmVplTable和atmVclTable中连续轮询每一行的耗时和资源密集型任务。

contents.text: The atmIntfPvcFailures counter and the atmIntfCurrentlyFailingPVpls and atmIntfCurrentlyFailingPVcls gauges provide a quick means of determining the status of all PVPLs and PVCLs on an interface. The atmCurrentlyFailingPVplTable and the atmCurrentlyFailingPVclTable list all of the problematic PVPLs and PVCLs, respectively, allowing them to be quickly identified.
contents.zh-CHS: ATMINTFPV故障计数器和atmIntfCurrentlyFailingPVpls和atmIntfCurrentlyFailingPVcls仪表提供了一种快速确定接口上所有PVPLs和PVCLs状态的方法。atmCurrentlyFailingPVplTable和atmCurrentlyFailingPVclTable分别列出所有有问题的PVPLs和PVCLs，以便快速识别它们。

contents.text: The atmIntfPvcFailuresTrap is generated just after a PVPL or PVCL on a particular interface leaves the 'up' operational state. Managers can then determine which PVPLs and/or PVCLs are failing by reading the atmCurrentlyFailingPVplTable and the atmCurrentlyFailingPVclTable. Generation of the atmIntfPvcFailuresTrap is rate limited by suppressing all traps that would occur within atmIntfPvcNotificationInterval of a previous trap for the same interface. Managers should continuously poll the tables and objects mentioned above for at least this amount of time in order to keep up with the state of the network.
contents.zh-CHS: atmIntfPvcFailuresTrap是在特定接口上的PVPL或PVCL离开“启动”操作状态后生成的。然后，经理可以通过读取atmCurrentlyFailingPVplTable和atmCurrentlyFailingPVclTable来确定哪些PVPL和/或PVCL出现故障。通过抑制在同一接口的前一个陷阱的ATMINTFPV通知间隔内发生的所有陷阱，ATMINTFPV FailureStrap的生成速率受到限制。管理者应至少在这段时间内持续轮询上述表和对象，以跟上网络状态。

contents.text: 4. Conformance and Compliance
contents.zh-CHS: 4. 合规性和合规性

contents.text: See the conformance and compliance statements within the information module.
contents.zh-CHS: 请参阅信息模块中的合规性和合规性声明。

contents.text: 5. Definitions
contents.zh-CHS: 5. 定义

contents.text: ATM2-MIB DEFINITIONS ::= BEGIN

IMPORTS MODULE-IDENTITY, OBJECT-TYPE, NOTIFICATION-TYPE, Gauge32, Counter32, Integer32 FROM SNMPv2-SMI TruthValue, RowStatus, TimeStamp FROM SNMPv2-TC MODULE-COMPLIANCE, OBJECT-GROUP, NOTIFICATION-GROUP FROM SNMPv2-CONF SnmpAdminString FROM SNMP-FRAMEWORK-MIB InterfaceIndex, InterfaceIndexOrZero, ifIndex FROM IF-MIB atmMIBObjects, atmInterfaceConfEntry, atmVplEntry, atmVplVpi, atmVclEntry, atmVclVpi, atmVclVci,
contents.zh-CHS: 从SNMPv2 SMI TruthValue导入模块标识、对象类型、通知类型、仪表32、计数器32、整数32、从SNMPv2 TC导入时间戳模块符合性、从SNMPv2 CONF导入对象组、从SNMPadmin导入通知组从SNMP-FRAMEWORK-MIB InterfaceIndex、从InterfaceIndexOrZero、从IF-MIB ATMMIBObject导入ifIndex、，ATMINTERFACECONTRY、atmVplVpi、atmVclVpi、atmVclVpi、atmVclVci、，

contents.text: atmVpCrossConnectEntry, atmVcCrossConnectEntry FROM ATM-MIB AtmAddr, AtmSigDescrParamIndex, AtmInterfaceType, AtmIlmiNetworkPrefix, AtmVcIdentifier, AtmVpIdentifier, AtmTrafficDescrParamIndex FROM ATM-TC-MIB;
contents.zh-CHS: 来自ATM-MIB AtmAddr的atmVpCrossConnectEntry、atmVcCrossConnectEntry、AtmSigDescrParamIndex、AtmInterfaceType、AtmIlmiNetworkPrefix、AtmVcIdentifier、AtmVpIdentifier、来自ATM-TC-MIB的AtmTrafficDescrParamIndex；

atm2MIBObjects  OBJECT IDENTIFIER ::= {atm2MIB 1}
atm2MIBTraps OBJECT IDENTIFIER ::= {atm2MIB 2}

-- This ATM2-MIB Module consists of the following tables,
-- plus ATM trap support:
--      1. atmSvcVpCrossConnectTable
--      2. atmSvcVcCrossConnectTable
--      3. atmSigStatTable
--      4. atmSigSupportTable
--      5. atmSigDescrParamTable
--      6. atmIfRegisteredAddrTable
--      7. atmVclAddrTable
--      8. atmAddrVclTable
--      9. atmVplStatTable
--      10. atmVplLogicalPortTable
--      11. atmVclStatTable
--      12. atmAal5VclStatTable
--      13. atmVclGenTable
--      14. atmInterfaceExtTable
--      15. atmIlmiSrvcRegTable
--      16. atmIlmiNetworkPrefixTable
--      17. atmSwitchAddressTable
--      18. atmVpCrossConnectXTable
--      19. atmVcCrossConnectXTable
--      20. atmCurrentlyFailingPVplTable
--      21. atmCurrentlyFailingPVclTable
-- 1. ATM VPL SVC Cross-Connect Table
contents.zh-CHS: -- 1. ATM VPL SVC交叉连接表

contents.text: atmSvcVpCrossConnectTable OBJECT-TYPE
contents.zh-CHS: ATMSVCVPCrossConnectable对象类型

contents.text:
SYNTAX       SEQUENCE OF
             AtmSvcVpCrossConnectEntry
MAX-ACCESS   not-accessible
STATUS       current
DESCRIPTION
  "The ATM SVPC Cross-Connect table.  A
  bi-directional VP cross-connect between two
  switched VPLs is modeled as one entry in this
  table.  A Soft PVPC cross-connect, between a
  soft permanent VPL and a switched VPL, is
  also modeled as one entry in this table."
::= { atm2MIBObjects 1 }

atmSvcVpCrossConnectEntry OBJECT-TYPE
    SYNTAX       AtmSvcVpCrossConnectEntry
    MAX-ACCESS   not-accessible
    STATUS       current
    DESCRIPTION
      "An entry in the ATM SVPC Cross-Connect table.
      This entry is used to model a bi-directional
      ATM VP cross-connect between two VPLs."
    INDEX { atmSvcVpCrossConnectIndex,
            atmSvcVpCrossConnectLowIfIndex,
            atmSvcVpCrossConnectLowVpi,
            atmSvcVpCrossConnectHighIfIndex,
            atmSvcVpCrossConnectHighVpi }
    ::= { atmSvcVpCrossConnectTable 1 }

AtmSvcVpCrossConnectEntry ::= SEQUENCE {
    atmSvcVpCrossConnectIndex           INTEGER,
    atmSvcVpCrossConnectLowIfIndex      InterfaceIndex,
    atmSvcVpCrossConnectLowVpi          AtmVpIdentifier,
    atmSvcVpCrossConnectHighIfIndex     InterfaceIndex,
    atmSvcVpCrossConnectHighVpi         AtmVpIdentifier,
    atmSvcVpCrossConnectCreationTime    TimeStamp,
    atmSvcVpCrossConnectRowStatus       RowStatus
                  }

atmSvcVpCrossConnectIndex OBJECT-TYPE SYNTAX INTEGER (1..2147483647) MAX-ACCESS not-accessible STATUS current DESCRIPTION "A unique value to identify this SVPC cross-connect. For each VP associated with this cross-connect, the agent reports this cross-connect index value in the atmVplCrossConnectIdentifer attribute of the
contents.zh-CHS: ATMSVCVPCrossConnectionIndex对象类型语法整数（1..2147483647）MAX-ACCESS不可访问状态当前描述“标识此SVPC交叉连接的唯一值。对于与此交叉连接关联的每个VP，代理在的ATMVPLCrossConnectionIdentifier属性中报告此交叉连接索引值

contents.text:
corresponding atmVplTable entries."
::= { atmSvcVpCrossConnectEntry 1 }

atmSvcVpCrossConnectLowIfIndex OBJECT-TYPE
    SYNTAX       InterfaceIndex
    MAX-ACCESS   not-accessible
    STATUS       current
    DESCRIPTION
      "The value of this object is equal to the
      ifIndex value of the ATM interface port for this
      SVPC cross-connect.  The term low implies
      that this ATM interface has the numerically lower
      ifIndex value than the other ATM interface
      identified in the same atmSvcVpCrossConnectEntry."
    ::= { atmSvcVpCrossConnectEntry 2 }

atmSvcVpCrossConnectLowVpi OBJECT-TYPE
    SYNTAX       AtmVpIdentifier
    MAX-ACCESS   not-accessible
    STATUS       current
    DESCRIPTION
      "The value of this object is equal to the VPI
      value associated with the SVPC cross-connect
      at the ATM interface that is identified by
      atmSvcVpCrossConnectLowIfIndex.  The VPI value
      cannot exceed the number supported by the
      atmInterfaceCurrentMaxSvpcVpi at the low ATM interface
      port."
    ::= { atmSvcVpCrossConnectEntry 3 }

atmSvcVpCrossConnectHighIfIndex OBJECT-TYPE
    SYNTAX       InterfaceIndex
    MAX-ACCESS   not-accessible
    STATUS       current
    DESCRIPTION
     "The value of this object is equal to the
      ifIndex value of the ATM interface port for
      this SVC VP cross-connect.  The term high
      implies that this ATM interface has the
      numerically higher ifIndex value than the
      other ATM interface identified in the same
      atmSvcVpCrossConnectEntry."
    ::= { atmSvcVpCrossConnectEntry 4 }
atmSvcVpCrossConnectHighVpi OBJECT-TYPE SYNTAX AtmVpIdentifier MAX-ACCESS not-accessible STATUS current
contents.zh-CHS: atmSvcVpCrossConnectHighVpi对象类型语法AtmVpIdentifier MAX-ACCESS不可访问状态当前

contents.text:
DESCRIPTION
 "The value of this object is equal to the VPI

atmSigSSCOPConEvents OBJECT-TYPE SYNTAX Counter32 MAX-ACCESS read-only STATUS current
contents.zh-CHS: atmSigSSCOPConEvents对象类型语法计数器32 MAX-ACCESS只读状态当前

contents.text: DESCRIPTION "SSCOP Connection Events Counter. This counter counts the sum of the following errors:
contents.zh-CHS: 说明“SSCOP连接事件计数器。此计数器统计以下错误的总和：

contents.text: 1) SSCOP Connection Disconnect Counter
contents.zh-CHS: 1) SSCOP连接断开计数器

contents.text: The abnormal occurrence of this event is characterized by the expiry of Timer_NO_RESPONSE. (This event is communicated to the layer management with MAA-ERROR code P. See ITU-T Q.2110.)
contents.zh-CHS: 此事件的异常发生以计时器\u NO\u响应到期为特征。（该事件通过MAA-错误代码P传达给层管理。参见ITU-T Q.2110。）

contents.text: 2) SSCOP Connection Initiation Failure
contents.zh-CHS: 2) SSCOP连接启动故障

contents.text: This condition indicates the inability to establish an SSCOP connection. This event occurs whenever the number of expiries of the connection control timer (Timer_CC) equals or exceeds the MaxCC, or upon receipt of a connection reject message BGREJ PDU. (This event is communicated to layer management with MAA-ERROR code O. See ITU-T Q.2110.)
contents.zh-CHS: 这种情况表示无法建立SSCOP连接。只要连接控制计时器（timer_CC）的过期次数等于或超过MaxCC，或者收到连接拒绝消息BGREJ PDU，就会发生此事件。（该事件通过MAA-ERROR代码O传达给层管理。参见ITU-T Q.2110。）

contents.text: 3) SSCOP Connection Re-Establ/Resynch
contents.zh-CHS: 3) SSCOP连接重新建立/重新同步

contents.text:
This event occurs upon receipt of a BGN PDU or
         RS PDU."
REFERENCE
    "ITU-T Recommendation Q.2110, Broadband
     Integrated Services Digital Network
     (B-ISDN) - ATM Adaptation Layer - Service
     Specific Connection Oriented Protocol (SSCOP)
     Specification, July 1994."
::= { atmSigStatEntry 1}
atmSigSSCOPErrdPdus OBJECT-TYPE SYNTAX Counter32 MAX-ACCESS read-only STATUS current DESCRIPTION "SSCOP Errored PDUs Counter. This counter counts the sum of the following errors:
contents.zh-CHS: atmSigSSCOPErrdPdus对象类型语法计数器32 MAX-ACCESS只读状态当前描述“SSCOP Errored PDU计数器。此计数器统计以下错误的总和：

contents.text: 1) Invalid PDUs. These are defined in SSCOP and consist of PDUs with an incorrect length (MAA-ERROR code U), an undefined PDU type code, or that are not 32-bit aligned.
contents.zh-CHS: 1) 无效的PDU。这些在SSCOP中定义，由长度不正确（MAA错误代码U）、未定义的PDU类型代码或未32位对齐的PDU组成。

contents.text: 2) PDUs that result in MAA-ERROR codes and are
contents.zh-CHS: 2) 导致MAA错误代码的PDU，并且

contents.text: discarded.
contents.zh-CHS: 丢弃的。

contents.text:
See MAA-ERROR codes A-D, F-M, and Q-T defined in
    ITU-T Q.2110."
REFERENCE
    "ITU-T Recommendation Q.2110, Broadband
     Integrated Services Digital Network
     (B-ISDN) - ATM Adaptation Layer - Service
     Specific Connection Oriented Protocol (SSCOP)

contents.text: DESCRIPTION "Number of Incorrect Messages detected on this interface. The Incorrect Messages Counter reflects any sort of incorrect information in a message. This includes:
contents.zh-CHS: DESCRIPTION“在此接口上检测到的错误消息数。错误消息计数器反映消息中任何类型的错误信息。这包括：

contents.text: - RELEASE, RELEASE COMPLETE, ADD PARTY REJECT, and STATUS messages transmitted, that contain any of the Cause values listed below.
contents.zh-CHS: - 释放、释放完成、添加方拒绝和传输的状态消息，包含以下列出的任何原因值。

contents.text: - Ignored messages. These messages are dropped because the message was so damaged that it could not be further processed. A list of dropped messages is compiled below:
contents.zh-CHS: - 忽略消息。这些消息被丢弃，因为消息已损坏，无法进一步处理。已删除邮件的列表编译如下：

contents.text: 1. Message with invalid protocol discriminator
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 具有无效协议鉴别器的消息

contents.text: 2. Message with errors in the call reference I.E. - Bits 5-8 of the first octet not equal to '0000' - Bits 1-4 of the first octet indicating a length other than 3 octets - RELEASE COMPLETE message received with a call reference that does not relate to a call active or in progress - SETUP message received with call reference flag incorrectly set to 1 - SETUP message received with a call reference for a call that is already active or in progress.
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 呼叫参考中存在错误的消息，即-第一个八位字节的第5-8位不等于“0000”-第一个八位字节的第1-4位表示长度不是3个八位字节-释放接收到的与呼叫参考不相关的完整消息，该呼叫参考与正在进行的呼叫无关-接收到的设置消息中呼叫参考标志错误设置为1-已收到设置消息，其中包含已激活或正在进行的呼叫的呼叫参考。

contents.text: 3. Message too short
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 信息太短

contents.text: The following cause values are monitored by this counter (Note: These cause values apply to both UNI3.0 and UNI3.1 unless otherwise stated):
contents.zh-CHS: 以下原因值由该计数器监控（注：除非另有说明，否则这些原因值适用于UNI3.0和UNI3.1）：

contents.text: Cause Value Meaning
contents.zh-CHS: 原因价值意义

contents.text: 10 VPCI/VCI unacceptable (UNI3.0 only) 36 VPCI/VCI assignment failure (UNI3.1 only) 81 invalid call reference value 82 identified channel does not exist 89 invalid endpoint reference 96 mandatory information element is missing 97 message type non-existent or not implemented 99 information element non-existent or not implemented
contents.zh-CHS: 10 VPCI/VCI不可接受（仅限UNI3.0）36 VPCI/VCI分配失败（仅限UNI3.1）81无效呼叫参考值82标识的通道不存在89无效端点参考96强制信息元素缺失97消息类型不存在或未实现99信息元素不存在或未实现

contents.text: 100 invalid information element contents 101 message not compatible with call state 104 incorrect message length 111 protocol error, unspecified
contents.zh-CHS: 100无效信息元素内容101消息与呼叫状态不兼容104消息长度不正确111协议错误，未指定

contents.text: NOTE: For this counter, RELEASE COMPLETE messages that are a reply to a previous RELEASE message and contain the same cause value, are redundant (for counting purposes) and should not be counted."
contents.zh-CHS: 注意：对于此计数器，作为对先前发布消息的回复且包含相同原因值的发布完整消息是冗余的（用于计数），不应计数。“

contents.text: ::= { atmSigStatEntry 11 }

Message with errors in the call reference I.E. - Bits 5-8 of the first octet not equal to '0000' - Bits 1-4 of the first octet indicating a length other than 3 octets - RELEASE COMPLETE message received with a call reference that does not relate to a call active or in progress - SETUP message received with call reference flag incorrectly set to 1 - SETUP message received with a call reference for a call that is already active or in progress.
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 呼叫参考中存在错误的消息，即-第一个八位字节的第5-8位不等于“0000”-第一个八位字节的第1-4位表示长度不是3个八位字节-释放接收到的与呼叫参考不相关的完整消息，该呼叫参考与正在进行的呼叫无关-接收到的设置消息中呼叫参考标志错误设置为1-已收到设置消息，其中包含已激活或正在进行的呼叫的呼叫参考。

atmSigDetectClgPtyEvents OBJECT-TYPE SYNTAX Counter32 MAX-ACCESS read-only STATUS current DESCRIPTION "Number of Calling Party Events detected on this interface. This counter monitors error events that occur due to the originating user doing something wrong. This counter is incremented when a RELEASE, RELEASE COMPLETE (only when not preceded by a RELEASE message for the same call), ADD PARTY REJECT, or STATUS message that contains one of the following cause code values is received (Note: These cause values apply to both UNI3.0 and UNI3.1):
contents.zh-CHS: atmSigDetectClgPtyEvents对象类型语法计数器32 MAX-ACCESS只读状态当前描述“在此接口上检测到的呼叫方事件数。此计数器监视由于原始用户出错而发生的错误事件。当发布、发布完成时，此计数器递增（仅当未在同一呼叫的释放消息之前）、添加方拒绝或接收到包含以下原因代码值之一的状态消息时（注意：这些原因值同时适用于UNI3.0和UNI3.1）：

contents.text: Cause Value Meaning
contents.zh-CHS: 原因价值意义

contents.text: 28 invalid number format (address incomplete) 43 access information discarded 57 bearer capability not authorized 65 bearer capability not implemented
contents.zh-CHS: 28无效数字格式（地址不完整）43访问信息丢弃57承载能力未授权65承载能力未实现

contents.text: 73 unsupported combination of traffic parameters 78 AAL parameters cannot be supported (UNI3.1 only) 91 invalid transit network selection 93 AAL parameters cannot be supported (UNI3.0 only)
contents.zh-CHS: 73不支持的交通参数组合78 AAL参数不受支持（仅限UNI3.1）91无效的公交网络选择93 AAL参数不受支持（仅限UNI3.0）

contents.text: NOTE: For this counter, RELEASE COMPLETE messages that are a reply to a previous RELEASE message and contain the same cause value, are redundant (for counting purposes) and should not be counted."
contents.zh-CHS: 注意：对于此计数器，作为对先前发布消息的回复且包含相同原因值的发布完整消息是冗余的（用于计数），不应计数。“

contents.text: ::= { atmSigStatEntry 13 }

atmSigEmitClgPtyEvents OBJECT-TYPE SYNTAX Counter32 MAX-ACCESS read-only STATUS current DESCRIPTION "Number of Calling Party Events transmitted from this interface. This counter monitors error events that occur due to the originating user doing something wrong. This counter is incremented when a RELEASE, RELEASE COMPLETE (only when not preceded by a RELEASE message for the same call), ADD PARTY REJECT, or STATUS message that contains one of the following cause code values is transmitted (Note: These cause values apply to both UNI3.0 and UNI3.1):
contents.zh-CHS: ATMSIGITCGPTYEVENTS对象类型语法计数器32 MAX-ACCESS只读状态当前描述“从此接口传输的呼叫方事件数。此计数器监视由于原始用户出错而发生的错误事件。当发布、发布完成时，此计数器递增（仅当未在同一呼叫的释放消息之前）、添加方拒绝或包含以下原因代码值之一的状态消息被传输时（注意：这些原因值同时适用于UNI3.0和UNI3.1）：

contents.text: Cause Value Meaning
contents.zh-CHS: 原因价值意义

contents.text: 28 invalid number format (address incomplete) 43 access information discarded 57 bearer capability not authorized 65 bearer capability not implemented 73 unsupported combination of traffic parameters 78 AAL parameters cannot be supported (UNI3.1 only) 91 invalid transit network selection 93 AAL parameters cannot be supported (UNI3.0 only)
contents.zh-CHS: 28无效数字格式（地址不完整）43访问信息丢弃57承载能力未授权65承载能力未实现73不支持的流量参数组合78 AAL参数不受支持（仅限UNI3.1）91无效传输网络选择93 AAL参数不受支持（仅限UNI3.0）

contents.text: NOTE: For this counter, RELEASE COMPLETE messages that are a reply to a previous RELEASE message and contain the same cause value, are redundant (for counting purposes) and should not be counted."
contents.zh-CHS: 注意：对于此计数器，作为对先前发布消息的回复且包含相同原因值的发布完整消息是冗余的（用于计数），不应计数。“

contents.text: ::= { atmSigStatEntry 14 }

atmSigDetectTimerExpireds OBJECT-TYPE SYNTAX Counter32 MAX-ACCESS read-only STATUS current DESCRIPTION "Number of Timer Expiries detected on this interface. The Timer Expiries Counter provides a count of network timer expiries, and to some extent, host or switch timer expiries. The conditions for incrementing this counter are:
contents.zh-CHS: ATMSIGDetectTimerXPIREDS对象类型语法计数器32 MAX-ACCESS只读状态当前描述“在此接口上检测到的计时器过期数。计时器过期计数器提供网络计时器过期计数，并在某种程度上提供主机或交换机计时器过期计数。增加此计数器的条件包括：

contents.text: - Expiry of any network timer
contents.zh-CHS: - 任何网络计时器的过期时间

contents.text: - Receipt of a RELEASE or RELEASE COMPLETE message with Cause #102, 'recovery on timer expiry'.
contents.zh-CHS: - 收到原因为#102“计时器到期时恢复”的释放或释放完成消息。

contents.text: NOTE: For this counter, RELEASE COMPLETE messages that are a reply to a previous RELEASE message and contain the same cause value, are redundant (for counting purposes) and should not be counted."
contents.zh-CHS: 注意：对于此计数器，作为对先前发布消息的回复且包含相同原因值的发布完整消息是冗余的（用于计数），不应计数。“

contents.text: ::= { atmSigStatEntry 15 }

atmSigEmitTimerExpireds OBJECT-TYPE SYNTAX Counter32 MAX-ACCESS read-only STATUS current DESCRIPTION "Number of Timer Expiries transmitted from this interface. The Timer Expiries Counter provides a count of network timer expiries, and to some extent, host or switch timer expiries. The conditions for incrementing this counter are:
contents.zh-CHS: ATMSIgnitimerExpireds对象类型语法计数器32 MAX-ACCESS只读状态当前描述“从此接口传输的计时器过期数。计时器过期计数器提供网络计时器过期计数，并在某种程度上提供主机或交换机计时器过期计数。递增此计数器的条件为：

contents.text: - Expiry of any network timer
contents.zh-CHS: - 任何网络计时器的过期时间

contents.text: - Receipt of a RELEASE or RELEASE COMPLETE message with Cause #102, 'recovery on timer expiry'.
contents.zh-CHS: - 收到原因为#102“计时器到期时恢复”的释放或释放完成消息。

contents.text: NOTE: For this counter, RELEASE COMPLETE messages that are a reply to a previous RELEASE message and contain the same cause value, are redundant (for counting purposes) and should not be counted."

-- 4. ATM Interface Signalling Support Table
--
-- This table provides information to support
-- the signalling process which is used to establish
-- ATM Switched Virtual Connections (SVCs).

atmSigSupportTable       OBJECT-TYPE
    SYNTAX       SEQUENCE OF AtmSigSupportEntry
    MAX-ACCESS   not-accessible
    STATUS       current
    DESCRIPTION
       "This table contains ATM local interface configuration
       parameters, one entry per ATM signalling interface."
    ::= { atm2MIBObjects 4 }

atmSigSupportEntry         OBJECT-TYPE
    SYNTAX       AtmSigSupportEntry
    MAX-ACCESS   not-accessible
    STATUS       current
    DESCRIPTION
       "This list contains signalling configuration parameters
       and state variables."
    INDEX { ifIndex }
    ::= { atmSigSupportTable  1}

AtmSigSupportEntry    ::= SEQUENCE  {
    atmSigSupportClgPtyNumDel       INTEGER,
    atmSigSupportClgPtySubAddr      INTEGER,
    atmSigSupportCldPtySubAddr      INTEGER,
    atmSigSupportHiLyrInfo          INTEGER,
    atmSigSupportLoLyrInfo          INTEGER,
    atmSigSupportBlliRepeatInd      INTEGER,
    atmSigSupportAALInfo            INTEGER,
    atmSigSupportPrefCarrier        OCTET STRING
}

atmSigSupportClgPtyNumDel OBJECT-TYPE SYNTAX INTEGER { enabled(1), disabled(2) } MAX-ACCESS read-write STATUS current DESCRIPTION "This object indicates whether the Calling Party Number Information Element is transferred to the called party address. The value of this object can be:
contents.zh-CHS: atmSigSupportClgPtyNumDel对象类型语法整数{enabled（1），disabled（2）}MAX-ACCESS读写状态当前描述“此对象表示是否将主叫方号码信息元素传输到被叫方地址。此对象的值可以是：

contents.text: - enabled(1) This Information Element is transferred to the called party
contents.zh-CHS: - 启用（1）此信息元素被传输到被叫方

contents.text: - disabled(2) This Information Element is NOT transferred to the called party."
contents.zh-CHS: - 禁用（2）此信息元素不会传输到被叫方。“

The value of this object can be:

atmSigSupportPrefCarrier OBJECT-TYPE SYNTAX OCTET STRING (SIZE(0|4)) MAX-ACCESS read-write STATUS current DESCRIPTION "This parameter identifies the carrier to which intercarrier calls originated from this interface are routed when transit network selection information is not provided by the calling party. If a Carrier Identification Code (CIC) is used the parameter shall contain the CIC. For three-digit CICs, the first octet shall be '0' and the CIC is contained in the three following octets. If the preferred carrier feature is not supported the value is a zero-length string."
contents.zh-CHS: atmSigSupportPrefCarrier对象类型语法八位字符串（大小（0 | 4））MAX-ACCESS读写状态当前描述“当呼叫方未提供传输网络选择信息时，此参数标识从该接口发起的载波间呼叫路由到的载波。如果载波标识码（CIC）使用时，参数应包含CIC。对于三位CIC，第一个八位字节应为“0”，CIC包含在后面三个八位字节中。如果不支持首选载波功能，则该值为零长度字符串。”

contents.text: ::= { atmSigDescrParamEntry 4 }

atmSigDescrParamBhliInfo OBJECT-TYPE SYNTAX OCTET STRING (SIZE(0..8)) MAX-ACCESS read-create STATUS current DESCRIPTION "The Broadband high layer information. When atmSigDescrParamBhliType is set to iso(2), the value of this object is a zero length string. When atmSigDescrParamBhliType is set to user(3), the value of this object is an octet string with length ranging from 0 to 8. When atmSigDescrParamBhliType is set to hiProfile(4), the value of this object is a length of 4 octet string containing user to user profile identifier. When atmSigDescrParamBhliType is set to vendorSpecific(5), the value of this object is a length of 7 octet string, where the most significant 3 octets consist of a globally-administered OUI, and the least significant 4 octets are the vender administered application OUI."
contents.zh-CHS: atmSigDescrParamBhliInfo对象类型语法八位字节字符串（大小（0..8））MAX-ACCESS read create STATUS current DESCRIPTION“宽带高层信息。当atmSigDescrParamBhliType设置为iso（2）时，此对象的值为零长度字符串。当atmSigDescrParamBhliType设置为user（3）时，此对象的值是长度范围为0到8的八位字节字符串。当atmSigDescrParamBhliType设置为hiProfile（4）时，此对象的值是长度为4的八位字节字符串，其中包含用户到用户配置文件标识符。当atmSigDescrParamBhliType设置为vendorSpecific（5）时，此对象的值是一个长度为7个八位字节的字符串，其中最重要的3个八位字节由全局管理的OUI组成，最不重要的4个八位字节是供应商管理的应用程序OUI。”

atmIfRegisteredAddrTable    OBJECT-TYPE
    SYNTAX       SEQUENCE OF AtmIfRegisteredAddrEntry
    MAX-ACCESS   not-accessible
    STATUS       current
    DESCRIPTION
       "This table contains a list of ATM addresses that can be used for
       calls to and from a given interface by a switch or service.  The
       ATM addresses are either registered by the endsystem via ILMI or
       statically configured.  This table does not expose PNNI
       reachability information.  ILMI registered addresses cannot be
       deleted using this table.  This table only applies to switches
       and network services."
    ::= { atm2MIBObjects 6 }

        "This table provides a mapping between the atmVclTable and
        the ATM called party/calling party address.  This table can
        be used to retrieve the calling party and called party ATM
        address pair for a given VCL.  Note that there can be more

        addresses for a VCL in a point to multi-point call."

contents.text: ::= { atm2MIBObjects 8 }

atmAddrVclEntry    OBJECT-TYPE
    SYNTAX       AtmAddrVclEntry
    MAX-ACCESS   not-accessible
    STATUS       current
    DESCRIPTION
        "Each entry in this table represents an entry in the
        atmVclTable of the ATM-MIB by its ATM address.  The ATM
        address is either the calling or called party ATM address
        of the call.  Entries in this table are read only.
        They show up when entries are created in the
        atmVclAddrTable."
    REFERENCE
        "Tesink, K., Editor, Definitions of Managed Objects
         for ATM Management, RFC 2515, Bell Communications
         Research, February, 1999."
    INDEX { atmVclAddrAddr, atmAddrVclAtmIfIndex,
            atmAddrVclVpi, atmAddrVclVci }
    ::= { atmAddrVclTable 1 }

AtmAddrVclEntry ::=
    SEQUENCE {
        atmAddrVclAtmIfIndex    InterfaceIndex,
        atmAddrVclVpi           AtmVpIdentifier,
        atmAddrVclVci           AtmVcIdentifier,
        atmAddrVclAddrType      INTEGER
        }

atmAddrVclAtmIfIndex     OBJECT-TYPE
    SYNTAX       InterfaceIndex
    MAX-ACCESS   not-accessible
    STATUS       current
    DESCRIPTION
        "The interface index of the ATM interface to which this
         VCL pertains.  This object combined with the
         atmAddrVclVpi and atmAddrVclVci objects serves as an
         index to the atmVclTable."
    ::= { atmAddrVclEntry 1 }

atmAddrVclVpi     OBJECT-TYPE
    SYNTAX       AtmVpIdentifier
    MAX-ACCESS   not-accessible
    STATUS       current
    DESCRIPTION
        "The VPI value of the VCL.  This object combined with the
        atmAddrVclAtmIfIndex and atmAddrVclVci objects serves as
        an index to the atmVclTable."
    ::= { atmAddrVclEntry 2 }

atmAddrVclVci     OBJECT-TYPE
    SYNTAX       AtmVcIdentifier
    MAX-ACCESS   not-accessible
    STATUS       current
    DESCRIPTION
        "The VCI value of the VCL.  This object combined with the
        atmAddrVclAtmIfIndex and atmAddrVclVpi objects serves as
        an index to the atmVclTable."
    ::= { atmAddrVclEntry 3 }

atmAddrVclAddrType     OBJECT-TYPE
    SYNTAX       INTEGER {
        callingParty(1),
        calledParty(2) }
    MAX-ACCESS   read-only
    STATUS       current
    DESCRIPTION
         "The type of ATM Address represented by the object
         atmVclAddrAddr.  Choices are either calling party address
         or called party address."
    ::= { atmAddrVclEntry 4 }

    STATUS       current
    DESCRIPTION
        "This table contains all statistics counters per VCL.  It is
        used to monitor the usage of the VCL in terms of incoming
        cells and outgoing cells."
    ::= { atm2MIBObjects 11 }

atmVclStatEntry    OBJECT-TYPE
    SYNTAX       AtmVclStatEntry
    MAX-ACCESS   not-accessible
    STATUS       current
    DESCRIPTION
        "Each entry in this table represents a VCL."

AtmVclStatEntry ::=
    SEQUENCE {
        atmVclStatTotalCellIns      Counter32,
        atmVclStatClp0CellIns       Counter32,
        atmVclStatTotalDiscards     Counter32,
        atmVclStatClp0Discards      Counter32,
        atmVclStatTotalCellOuts     Counter32,
        atmVclStatClp0CellOuts      Counter32,
        atmVclStatClp0Tagged        Counter32

atmVclStatTotalCellIns OBJECT-TYPE

contents.text:
atmInterfaceExtTable    OBJECT-TYPE
    SYNTAX       SEQUENCE OF AtmInterfaceExtEntry
    MAX-ACCESS   not-accessible
    STATUS       current
    DESCRIPTION
       "This table contains ATM interface configuration and monitoring
       information not defined in the atmInterfaceConfTable from the
       ATM-MIB.  This includes the type of connection setup procedures,
       ILMI information, and information on the VPI/VCI range."
    REFERENCE
        "Tesink, K., Editor, Definitions of Managed Objects
         for ATM Management, RFC 2515, Bell Communications
         Research, February, 1999."
    ::= { atm2MIBObjects 14 }

atmInterfaceExtEntry    OBJECT-TYPE
    SYNTAX       AtmInterfaceExtEntry
    MAX-ACCESS   not-accessible
    STATUS       current
    DESCRIPTION
       "An entry extends the atmInterfaceConfEntry defined in the ATM-
       MIB.  Each entry corresponds to an ATM interface."
    REFERENCE
        "Tesink, K., Editor, Definitions of Managed Objects
         for ATM Management, RFC 2515, Bell Communications
         Research, February, 1999."
    AUGMENTS { atmInterfaceConfEntry }
    ::= { atmInterfaceExtTable 1 }

AtmInterfaceExtEntry    ::= SEQUENCE  {
        atmIntfConfigType                   AtmInterfaceType,
        atmIntfActualType                   AtmInterfaceType,
        atmIntfConfigSide                   INTEGER,
        atmIntfActualSide                   INTEGER,
        atmIntfIlmiAdminStatus              BITS,
        atmIntfIlmiOperStatus               BITS,

atmIntfIlmiFsmState INTEGER, atmIntfIlmiEstablishConPollIntvl Integer32, atmIntfIlmiCheckConPollIntvl Integer32, atmIntfIlmiConPollInactFactor Integer32, atmIntfIlmiPublicPrivateIndctr INTEGER, atmInterfaceConfMaxSvpcVpi INTEGER, atmInterfaceCurrentMaxSvpcVpi INTEGER, atmInterfaceConfMaxSvccVpi INTEGER, atmInterfaceCurrentMaxSvccVpi INTEGER, atmInterfaceConfMinSvccVci INTEGER, atmInterfaceCurrentMinSvccVci INTEGER, atmIntfSigVccRxTrafficDescrIndex AtmTrafficDescrParamIndex, atmIntfSigVccTxTrafficDescrIndex AtmTrafficDescrParamIndex, atmIntfPvcFailures Counter32, atmIntfCurrentlyFailingPVpls Gauge32, atmIntfCurrentlyFailingPVcls Gauge32, atmIntfPvcFailuresTrapEnable TruthValue, atmIntfPvcNotificationInterval INTEGER, atmIntfLeafSetupFailures Counter32, atmIntfLeafSetupRequests Counter32 }
contents.zh-CHS: ATMINTFILMIFSMSState INTEGER、ATMINTFILMILESSTABLISHCONPOLLINTVL Integer32、ATMINTFILMICCONPOLLINTVL Integer32、ATMINTFILMICCONPOLLINTFActor Integer32、ATMINTFILMIPIPUBLICPRIVATEINDCTR INTEGER、ATMINTERFACECONFMAXSVPI INTEGER、ATMINTERFACECurrentMAXSVPI INTEGER、ATMINTERFACECONFMAXSVCPI INTEGER、，atmInterfaceConfMinSvccVci整数、atmInterfaceCurrentMinSvccVci整数、ATMintFsigVCCrxTrafficDescriptIndex ATMtTrafficDescriptIndex、ATMintFsigVCCtTrafficDescriptIndex ATMtTrafficDescriptIndex、atmIntfPvcFailures计数器32、atmIntfCurrentlyFailingPVpls量表32、atmIntfCurrentlyFailingPVcls量表32、ATMintFpVCFailureStrapable TruthValue、，ATMINTFPVNotificationInterval INTEGER、ATMINTFLIFSETUPFailures计数器32、ATMINTFLIFSETUPRequests计数器32}

contents.text:
atmIntfConfigType     OBJECT-TYPE
    SYNTAX       AtmInterfaceType
    MAX-ACCESS   read-write
    STATUS       current
    DESCRIPTION
       "The type of connection setup procedures configured for the ATM
       interface.  Setting this variable to a value of 'other' is not
       allowed."
    DEFVAL { autoConfig }
    ::= { atmInterfaceExtEntry 1 }

atmIntfActualType     OBJECT-TYPE
    SYNTAX       AtmInterfaceType
    MAX-ACCESS   read-only
    STATUS       current
    DESCRIPTION
       "The type of connection setup procedures currently being used on
       the interface.  This may reflect a manually configured value for
       the interface type, or may be determined by other means such as
       auto-configuration.  A value of `autoConfig' indicates that
       auto-configuration was requested but has not yet been completed."
    ::= { atmInterfaceExtEntry 2 }
atmIntfConfigSide OBJECT-TYPE SYNTAX INTEGER {
contents.zh-CHS: atmIntfConfigSide对象类型语法整数{

contents.text:
other(1),
                 user(2),
                 network(3) }
MAX-ACCESS   read-write
STATUS       current
DESCRIPTION
   "The configured role of the managed entity as one side of the ATM
   interface.  This value does not apply when the object
   atmIntfConfigType is set to `autoConfig', `atmfPnni1Dot0', or
   `atmfBici2Dot0'."
::= { atmInterfaceExtEntry 3 }

atmIntfActualSide     OBJECT-TYPE
    SYNTAX       INTEGER  {
                     other(1),
                     user(2),
                     network(3),
                     symmetric(4) }
    MAX-ACCESS   read-only
    STATUS       current
    DESCRIPTION
       "The current role used by the managed entity to represent one
       side of the ATM interface."
    ::= { atmInterfaceExtEntry 4 }

atmIntfIlmiAdminStatus    OBJECT-TYPE
    SYNTAX       BITS { ilmi(0),
                        ilmiAddressRegistration(1),
                        ilmiConnectivity(2),
                        ilmiPvcPvpMgmt(3),
                        ilmiSigVccParamNegotiation(4) }
    MAX-ACCESS   read-write
    STATUS       current
    DESCRIPTION
       "Indicates which components of ILMI are administratively enabled
       on this interface.  If the 'ilmi' bit is not set, then no ILMI
       components are operational.  ILMI components other than auto-
       configuration that are not represented in the value have their
       administrative status determined according to the 'ilmi' bit.
       The ILMI auto-configuration component is enabled/disabled by the
       atmIntfConfigType object."
    ::= { atmInterfaceExtEntry 5 }
atmIntfIlmiOperStatus OBJECT-TYPE SYNTAX BITS { ilmi(0), ilmiAddressRegistration(1), ilmiConnectivity(2), ilmiPvcPvpMgmt(3),
contents.zh-CHS: atmIntfIlmiOperStatus对象类型语法位{ilmi（0），ilmiAddressRegistration（1），ilmiConnectivity（2），ILMIPVCPMGMT（3），

contents.text:
ilmiSigVccParamNegotiation(4) }
MAX-ACCESS   read-only
STATUS       current
DESCRIPTION
   "Indicates which components of ILMI are operational on this
   interface."
::= { atmInterfaceExtEntry 6 }

atmIntfIlmiFsmState OBJECT-TYPE SYNTAX INTEGER { stopped(1), linkFailing(2), establishing(3), configuring(4), retrievingNetworkPrefixes(5), registeringNetworkPrefixes(6), retrievingAddresses(7), registeringAddresses(8), verifying(9) } MAX-ACCESS read-only STATUS current DESCRIPTION "Indicates the state of the ILMI Finite State Machine associated with this interface."
contents.zh-CHS: atmIntfIlmiFsmState对象类型语法整数{stopped（1）、linkFailing（2）、building（3）、configuration（4）、retrievingNetworkPrefixes（5）、registeringNetworkPrefixes（6）、retrievingAddresses（7）、registeringAddresses（8）、verifying（9）}MAX-ACCESS只读状态当前描述“指示与此接口关联的ILMI有限状态机的状态。”

MAX-ACCESS   read-write
STATUS       current
DESCRIPTION
   "The amount of time T between successive transmissions of ILMI
   messages on this interface for the purpose of detecting loss of
   ILMI connectivity.  The distinguished value zero disables ILMI

This value is the minimum of atmInterfaceConfMaxSvccVpi, and the atmInterfaceConfMaxSvccVpi of the interface's UNI/NNI peer.
